howItWorks.title: How we estimate take home pay

intro.paragraph: This calculator provides an estimated take home pay figure for a single employment, based on the UK rules for:
intro.bullet1: Income Tax (England, Northern Ireland, Wales rates and bands) or Scottish Income Tax (if applicable)
intro.assumesTitle: This calculator assumes no other adjustments, for example:

personalAllowance.title: Personal Allowance
personalAllowance.reduction: If your adjusted net income is above £100,000, the Personal Allowance is reduced by £1 for every £2 over £100,000, reaching £0 at £125,140
personalAllowance.sourceLink: Income Tax rates and Personal Allowances - GOV.UK

englandNiTax.title: Income Tax (England and Northern Ireland)
englandNiTax.ratesApply: Rates apply to your taxable income above the Personal Allowance
englandNiTax.sourceLink: Rates and thresholds for employers 2025 to 2026 - GOV.UK

scotlandTax.title: Scottish Income Tax
scotlandTax.ratesApply: Rates apply to your taxable income above the Personal Allowance
scotlandTax.sourceLink: Rates and thresholds for employers 2025 to 2026 - GOV.UK

nationalInsurance.title: Employee National Insurance (Class 1, primary, NI category A)
nationalInsurance.ratesApply: National Insurance is calculated on gross earnings (not on taxable income)
nationalInsurance.sourceLink: Rates and thresholds for employers 2025 to 2026 - GOV.UK

calculationMethod.title: Calculation method (annual basis)
calculationMethod.step1: Convert the user input to an annual gross figure (for weekly or monthly pay, annualise first).
calculationMethod.step2: Determine Personal Allowance (including the reduction above £100,000 where applicable).
calculationMethod.step3formula: taxable income = annual gross − Personal Allowance
calculationMethod.step4: Calculate Income Tax by applying the relevant rates to the taxable income bands.
calculationMethod.step5: Calculate employee National Insurance (Class 1 primary) from the annual gross figure.
calculationMethod.step6formula: take home = annual gross − Income Tax − National Insurance
calculationMethod.step7: If the user selected weekly or monthly, convert the annual results back to that period.
